name: Design User Flow
title: Design User Flow
task: Create a user flow for a new feature.
goal: Visualize and optimize the user journey through the product.
details: Include user flow diagrams and key decision points.

name: Conduct Usability Testing
title: Conduct Usability Testing
task: Describe your process for conducting usability testing on a prototype.
goal: Validate design assumptions and identify usability issues.
details: Include usability testing methods and reporting.

name: Create Wireframes
title: Create Wireframes
task: Design wireframes for a new application screen.
goal: Provide a visual guide for the layout and elements of the screen.
context: During the design phase of feature development.
details: Include wireframe tools and best practices.

name: Persona Development
title: Persona Development
task: Develop user personas for the target audience.
goal: Create representative profiles to guide design decisions.
context: During user research and design planning.
details: Include persona templates and research methods.

name: Accessibility Review
title: Accessibility Review
task: List steps to review and improve accessibility in your design.
goal: Ensure the product is usable by people with diverse abilities.
context: During design and before development handoff.
details: Include accessibility standards and testing methods.

name: Design System Creation
title: Design System Creation
task: Outline the process for creating a design system for your product.
goal: Ensure consistency and efficiency in design and development.
context: During the initial design phase and as the product scales.
details: Include design system components and governance.

name: User Journey Mapping
title: User Journey Mapping
task: Map out a user journey for a key workflow.
goal: Visualize and optimize the end-to-end user experience.
context: During design thinking and user research.
details: Include journey mapping tools and techniques.

name: Feedback Integration
title: Feedback Integration
task: Describe how you collect and integrate user feedback into design iterations.
goal: Continuously improve the design based on user input.
context: After usability testing and user feedback sessions.
details: Include feedback analysis and prioritization methods.

name: Prototype Development
title: Prototype Development
task: Explain your approach to developing interactive prototypes.
goal: Create realistic and testable representations of the product.
context: During the design and development handoff.
details: Include prototyping tools and best practices.

name: Collaborate with Developers
title: Collaborate with Developers
task: List best practices for collaborating with developers during implementation.
goal: Ensure design feasibility and fidelity in development.
details: Include communication strategies and collaboration tools.

name: Visual Design Principles
title: Visual Design Principles
task: Describe key visual design principles you apply in your work.
goal: Create visually appealing and effective user interfaces.
context: During the design phase of feature development.

name: Conduct Heuristic Evaluation
title: Conduct Heuristic Evaluation
task: Outline the steps for conducting a heuristic evaluation of an interface.
goal: Identify usability issues and areas for improvement.
context: During design review and testing phases.
details: Include heuristic evaluation criteria and reporting.
